com.netflix.servo.publish.graphite

Class GraphiteMetricObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.publish.BaseMetricObserver
      • com.netflix.servo.publish.graphite.GraphiteMetricObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.servo.publish.MetricObserver

    public class GraphiteMetricObserver
extends com.netflix.servo.publish.BaseMetricObserver
    Observer that shunts metrics out to the excellent monitoring backend graphite. Developed and tested against version 0.9.10 of graphite. http://graphite.wikidot.com/

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphiteMetricObserver

        public GraphiteMetricObserver(java.lang.String metricPrefix,
                      java.lang.String graphiteServerAddress)
        Parameters:
        metricPrefix - base name to attach onto each metric published ("metricPrefix.{rest of name}". If null this section isn't attached. This section is useful to differentiate between multiple nodes of the same application server in a cluster.
        graphiteServerAddress - address of the graphite data port in "host:port" format.

      • GraphiteMetricObserver

        public GraphiteMetricObserver(java.lang.String metricPrefix,
                      java.lang.String graphiteServerAddress,
                      GraphiteNamingConvention namingConvention)
        Parameters:
        metricPrefix - base name to attach onto each metric published ("metricPrefix.{rest of name}". If null this section isn't attached. This section is useful to differentiate between multiple nodes of the same application server in a cluster.
        graphiteServerAddress - address of the graphite data port in "host:port" format.
        namingConvention - naming convention to extract a graphite compatible name from each Metric
